LANGUAGE.LABEL: Oops! The selected function is not currently available.
CREATE BILLING TOKENS: Click the "Process" button below to create billing token for new members.
CREATE MONTHLY PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to create monthly payments for members due to be billed on or before the date specified below.
PROCESS PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to process payments with a submitted status.
LIST DECLINED TOKENS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of members with declined tokens.
LIST DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of members with declined payments.
UPDATE DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to update declined payments with recently provided billing info.
VERIFY BONUS QUALIFIED MEMBERS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all active members that are qualified to earn bonuses or that are "Qualify" locked after the date specified below.
CALCULATE BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to calculate commissions and bonuses for all member payments in the specified date range below.
UNHIDE NEW BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to display all hidden new commissions and bonuses.
CREATE PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payouts for all unpaid bonuses totalling more that their autoship amount up to the date specified below.

CREAT PAYMENT CREDITS: Click the "Process" button below to create payment credits for all members with bill dates due within the next 30 days that have sufficient earned bonuses that have not been paid yet.
VERIFY QUALIFIED PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all active members that are qualified to receive a payout.
CREATE PAYOUT EXPORT FILES: Click the "Process" button below to create payout files for CoinBase and STP. Submitted payouts will be processed up to the date specified below and marked paid.
MARK SUBMITTED PAYOUTS PAID: Click the "Process" button below to update the status of all submitted payouts to paid, up to the date specified below.
UNHIDE NEW PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to display all hidden new payouts.
RECALCULATE GROUP SALES VOLUME: Click the "Process" button below to recalculate all group sales volume and check for new promotions.

POST SALES SUMMARY: Click the "Process" button below to post the current personal and group sales volume for all active members with personal sales volume. The sales summary will be posted with the date below.
LIST ENROLLER ORPHANED MEMBERS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of members without active enrollers.
CREATE NEW eWALLETS: Click the "Process" button below to list all eWallets for all new active International members to be imported into iPayout.
ASSIGN NEW eWALLETS: Click the "Process" button below to set the eWallet identifier for all new active International members.
SET MEMBER ALERTS: Click the "Process" button below to set declined payment alerts for all members.
CLEANUP OLD DATA: Click the "Process" button below to delete incomplete enrollments and other old data.
EXPORT ORDERS: Click the "Process" button below to export all submitted orders up to the date specified below and change their status to Inprocess.
ExportOrdersInprocess
UPDATE EXPORTED ORDERS: Click the "Process" button below to update all exported orders to Complete.
UpdateOrdersInprocess
EMAIL EARNED BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to email all members that earned bonuses created in the specified date range below.
RECALCULATE TITLE ADVANCEMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to recalculate title advancements for all members.
EXPORT PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to export payments with a submitted status.
UPDATE BINARY COUNT: Click the "Process" button below to update the member counts in the binary downline.
TOP RECRUITERS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of the top 50 recruiters.
TOP EARNERS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of the top 50 earners.
TOP COUNTRIES: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of the top countries.
EMAIL DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to email every member with a declined payment in the specified date range below.
SUSPEND DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to Suspend every member with a declined payment older that the date below.
CANCEL DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to Cancel every suspended member with a declined payment older that the date below.
ALL MEMBER LIST: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of all members.
ENROLLED MEMBER LIST: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of all enrolled downline members for the specified Member # below.
BINARY MEMBER LIST: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of all binary downline members for the specified Member # below.
CASH PAYMENTS TO BE PROCESSED: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of all cash payments to be processed.
LIST SALES ORDERS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of all Inprocess or Complete Sales Orders for the specified date range below.
LIST BINARY ORPHANED MEMBERS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of members without active binary sponsors.
ExportDataOrders
ExportDataItems
ExportDataPayments
ExportDataBonuses
ListBinaryOverage
ListMissingBilling
ListMissingPayment
ListMissingAddress
CLEAR LOST BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to clear all lost bonuses.
LIST LOST BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to list all lost bonuses greater or equal to the amount specified below.
EMAIL LOST BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to email all lost bonuses greater or equal to the amount specified below.
RECONCILE COMPANY WALLETS: Click the "Process" button below to reconcile all company wallets.
